channel.title: I've got a problem
channel.description: OK, I installed Ubuntu 7.04 on my Crappy Desktop, and, when I was finished installing it, I restarted my computer and it got to the part where it Does the Grub thing, and then, the screen goes black and my computer sits there with a black screen, after a few minutes it blinks once, and stays black. No clue whatsoever as to how to fix it, I'm having to run it off the live CD at this point.

item.title: I've got a problem
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Nevermind, I used the Live Cd to run from the First Hard Drive and it works now.

Read full topic

item.title: I've got a problem
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Try running it in safe mode to see what is going on.
